column1: length on middle and leg, a hint of swing in to the batsman, flicked towards square leg
length but on the pads and tucked away towards the deep square leg boundary, off the mark with a boundary
fuller but once again on the pads, Babar says thank you very much and flicks it once again towards the deep square leg boundary
length around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards deep square leg, fielder is there now
length around off, plays it towards extra cover with the soft hands for a quick single
fuller on the toes, flicks it behind square leg for one
pitched up once again, on the leg stump, and Babar clips it between the keeper and the short fine leg
exquisite! Balance, poise and everything good. It was a length ball on the stumps and Babar just presented the straight bat to send it past the bowler for four more
length outside off, was looking to drive it through covers, the bat turns in his hand, the ball dribbles towards square leg
length outside off, waits for it before opening the face of the bat to run it down to third man
short of length on the stumps, pulled towards deep-backward square leg for one
down the track and looks to go over the bowler's head, gets a thick outside edge towards the left of third man, comes back for the second
length outside off, looked like it came slower off the pitch, Munro was caught in the awkward position, plays a half-pull and is caught at short midwicket
he is off the mark with a boundary. Fuller and down the leg side, Livingstone moves across and flicks it fine
length around off, stays in the crease and blocks
length around off, looks to hoick it on the leg side, mistimes it towards short midwicket
length outside off, driven on the up but straight towards cover-point
fuller around off, nudges it towards point and sets off for a quick single
length ball on the stumps, comes down the track and pushes it towards short midwicket for a single
length on the stumps once again, Livingstone skips down and looks to work on the leg side, gets a leading edge towards cover-point
down the track once again and launches this leg stump length ball over long-on for a six, first of the match
use of feet once again to take this on the full, caresses it wide of mid-on for four more
length ball on the pads, works it towards deep midwicket for one
length around off, clears his front leg and smashes it between the umpire and the non-striker for four
length again and Livingstone looks to repeat the shot, loses his shape and ends up mistiming it towards short midwicket
short ball on middle and leg, Livingstone has pulled this over deep square boundary for six more. He is on 27 off just 11
slower one on the stumps, pushes it towards midwicket for a quick single
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep midwicket for a couple
length on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball, pitching outside off and angling in, Livingstone goes for the pull and misses
length again, dances down the wicket and gets a single to deep midwicket via a mistimed pull
length around off, angling in towards the batsman, plays it towards short midwicket
length but angling on the pads this time, Babar uses his wrists to flick it just past the short fine leg fielder's right
back to back fours for Babar. And done cheekily too. Short of length outside off, Babar plays it late just dabbing it with soft hands to beat the third man fielder
make that three in a row! Short and wide and Babar cuts it past the point fielder, disdainful this time
starts with a quicker one around off, Livingstone goes for the cut but finds backward point
worked towards midwicket for a single
length on the stumps, punched off the back foot towards mid-on, Shadab himself chases it and keeps it to one
slower one the stumps, comes forward and nudges it towards cover
short of length around off, punched off the back foot towards sweeper cover
floated outside off, Livingstone comes down the track and takes it on the full but ends up hitting it towards extra cover
length on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket from the back foot
length on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, was looking to work on the leg side, a leading edge towards covers
short of length on the stumps, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball on the leg stump, was looking to come down, ends up playing it back towards the bowler with a straight bat
fuller on the stumps, slogged over deep midwicket for a big six
short of length outside off, goes for the cut, the bottom hand comes off but manages to slice it over point
full toss around off, smashes it just over the bolwer's head for four more
down the track but it's short of length, ends up hitting it towards the bowler who goes low to his right but cannot latch on to the tough chance
short of length on the stumps, pulls it towards deep midwicket
slower one on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg
short of length outside off, stays back and tucks it towards deep-backward square leg
a bouncer outside off, Livingstone forehands it towards long-on
back of length around off, stays behind the line of the ball and defends
slower one around off, forced off the back foot towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on for a single and brings up his fifty off just 29 balls
short of length, rocks back and launches it into the orbit over deep midwicket
gone! Down the track and looks to hit it over the bowler's head, but the ball turns away from the batsman and Amad takes an easy catch at backward point
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
fuller on the off stump, turns it towards midwicket
fuller again, tucks it away towards short midwicket
short of length outside leg, Ingram goes for a pull and misses
back of length outside off, punches it towards extra cover for one
a slower full toss, back of the hand, pushed past the bowler for one
a bouncer, hurries on to the batsman who was looking to pull, mistimes it towards short midwicket, just short of the bowler
slower again, length around off, punches it towards short midwicket
short of length near the rib cage, pulls it towards fine leg
a loopy slower full toss down the leg side, helps it past the short fine leg for four
length on middle and leg and spinning away, Babar was looking to work it on the leg side, gets surprised by the turn as the ball rolls towards covers
fuller outside off, drives it towards deep cover for one
length ball and spinning past the pads to beat the flick
length again but way too down the leg side this time
fuller outside off, leans forward and works it towards backward point
length around off, stays back and flicks it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, punches it off the back foot, was in the air but away from the point fielder, gets to his fifty with a cracking boundary
four more, straying down the pads and helped on its way towards the fine leg boundary
length outside off, creamed away towards sweeper cover, pity it will fetch him only a single
fuller outside off, Ingram was deep in his crease and digs it out just past the bowler. A direct hit and he would have been run-out
short of length on the stumps, punches it back towards the bowler
length around off and middle, tucked away in front of square, scampers back for the second
slower one on the stumps, worked away towards midwicket for a couple
slower one outside off this time, Ingram waits for it before working it towards deep point for another brace
slower again around off, Ingram almost chips it to extra cover, one bounce to the fielder
length outside off, guided towards third man
short of length outside off, Ingram goes for the cut but ends up hitting it down the deep point fielder's throat
length outside off, dabs it towards third man
length outside off, dabbed towards third man once again
fuller outside off, smashes it towards deep backward point for a couple
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-off for a quick single
down the track to the length ball, can only work it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, smashes it down the ground but Shadab makes a tumbling stop to his left at mid-off
length outside off, stays in his crease and drags it towards deep midwicket boundary for four
slower one on the stumps, pushes it towards covers, the fielder shies at the bowler's end but the bowler fails to collect the throw and concedes an overthrow
short of length on the stumps, goes back and pulls it behind square leg, beating the man in the deep, for a four
another slower one, fuller around off, Dunk clears his front leg and looks to smash it down the ground but misses as the ball spins away from him
fuller on the stumps, chipped towards long-on, one bounce to the fielder
slower one once again, hits it towards covers
fuller and wider outside off, hits it towards extra cover and sets off
short of length outside off, mistimes it towards mid-off and sets off, Shadab swoops low, collects the ball and hits the stumps to fine Dunk short
slower length ball outside off, Babar was looking to run it down, ends up dabbing it too fine, towards the wicketkeeper
fuller outside off, steers it towards third man
slower one outside off, looks to hit across the line, misses
short of length outside off, goes for the upper cut, but doesn't get it from the middle of the bat, gets a couple to third man though
fuller on the stumps, Imad looks to work it on the leg side, cannot put the bat on the ball and the stumps are disturbed
slower length ball at the batsman, worked towards long-on
fuller but angled down the leg side
fuller on the off stump, Yamin digs it out but straight towards the bowler
fuller on the stumps, worked towards wide long-on for two
pitched up, digs it out towards deep square leg
length outside off, looks to pull it away but ends up slicing it towards point where Rumman takes it with fingers pointing upwards
dropped! A full toss on the off stump and smashed back towards the bowler, who gets both hands to it but fails to latch on to
short of length on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, gets a leg-bye though
short of length outside off, goes for the upper cut but misses
a slower one, full on the off stump, Yamin looks to slog it away, misses and the hits the off stump
slower one around off, Amir moves across and looks to scoop it fine, misses
slower one around off, Amir backs away a bit and smashes it over the bowler's head, clears the boundary
a wide yorker, Amir plays and misses, steps out a couple of metres trying to steal a bye but stops mid-way, the keeper effects a direct-hit
length outside off, stands in his crease and smashes it towards cover
length around off, pushed towards covers, will get a single this time
fuller outside off, drives it towards mid-off
Colin Ingram has pulled off a screamer. Fuller around off, Delport looks to go over mid-off, mistimes it and Ingram pedals backward to take it with his outstretched left hand
length on the stumps, punched towards mid-on
fuller on the stumps and hits past the bowler, hard. No chance for the mid-off fielder
length around off, Ronchi stays in the crease and defends it towards covers
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but under-edges it into the ground and to the keeper
length around off, hits it back towards the bowler, looked like a cutter from Amir
a bouncer outside off, Ronchi lets it go through to the keeper
fuller outside off, Ronchi gets down and goes over extra cover, one bounce and over the boundary
short of length outside off, smashes it towards point but straight towards the fielder
fuller on the stumps, digs it out back towards the bowler
length on the stumps, sweeps it towards short fine leg
length on the stumps, punches it towards long-on
quicker again, stays in the crease and pushes it towards covers
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
flatter again, length on the stumps, comes down the track and chops it towards covers
length around off, pushes it towards mid-off
short of length around off, goes for the pull but top-edges it over the keeper's head, gets a lucky boundary
length around off, stays behind the line and defends
length outside off, driven on the up, opens the face a bit to send it between point and cover
a cutter around off, stays back and pushes it towards point
length ball, on the stumps, looks to flick but misses, an appeal for lbw but perhaps there was some bat involved
fuller around off, Ronchi gives himself a bit of room and lofts it over mid-off, carries all the way for a six
down the track, Imad follows the batsman this time, pushes it towards mid-on
length around off, punched back towards the bowler
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, collects a leg-bye though
fuller on the pads, goes down and sweeps, not from the middle of the bat but it races past the short fine leg
length outside off, hit it through covers for back to back fours, all hands from Ronchi
short of length angling across, goes for the wild swing and misses
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards the right of mid-on for a quick single
slower one but down the leg side, Ronchi looks to help it fine but misses
slower one, length on middle and leg, Ronchi was early into the pull, misses and gets hit on the body, collects a leg-bye as the ball rolls on the off side
fuller outside off, smashes but straight back towards the bowler
tucked away behind square for a single
slower length ball on the stumps, lobs it towards long-on for one

and gets Ronchi first-ball, length around off and Ronchi has hit it straight down the long-off fielder's throat. He was looking it to give himself room and hit it towards extra cover but doesn't get it right
length outside off, goes back and punches it towards extra cover
length on the stumps, flicked away towards square leg
fuller outside off, goes aerial but doesn't middle it, ends up slicing it towards deep extra cover
length around off, stays back and works it towards deep midwicket

and he strikes again! Beats Hussain Talat in the flight who stepped down but Umer shortened the length and bowled an arm ball. The batsman pushes at it but misses as he is way inside the line. An easy stumping for Dunk
fuller on the stumps, looks to flick, gets a leading edge that lobs over the bowler
length around off, steered towards point, a tumbling stop by Rizwan
fuller around off, comes forward but drives straight towards mid-off
short and down the leg side, Asif Ali swivels and pulls it over fine leg for a six
length on middle and leg, tucks it towards the right of long-on
length on the pads, nudges it towards square leg, scampers back for the second
length outside off, cuts it towards point
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and defends it back towards the bowler
three dots in a row. Length ball on the stumps, punched towards short midwicket off the back foot
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and chips it towards deep midwicket for a couple
down the track once again, Umer shortened his length but Asif Ali holds his shape and flat-bats it past the bowler
length ball on the stumps, punched towards short midwicket
short of length on middle and leg, flicks it towards square leg for one
length outside off, pushes it towards point
dropped by Rizwan! Slower length ball, looks to go over long-on but ends up skying it towards covers where Rizwan spills it
length ball on the stumps, drags it towards midwicket
length outside off, flat-bats it towards long-off
length ball, pushed back towards the bowler who makes a partial stop, extra cover tidies it up
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but the point fielder makes a partial diving stop to his right
short outside off, cuts hard but straight towards point
short but on the stumps, cuts it towards point and sets off, the fielder was quick to the ball and has a shy at the bowler's ends misses, a direct hit and Salt would have been run-out
length but room outside off, Asif Ali dabs it past the short third man who puts in the chase but cannot prevent the boundary
length outside off, goes for the cut and misses
right in the blockhole, Salt does well to jam his bat at it, sneaks in a single as the ball rolls down the wicket
short of length outside off, looks to steer it behind point, misses
fuller on the stumps, takes a step down and pushes it towards deep extra cover
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat the man at point
length outside off, skips down and looks to work it on the leg side, misses and gets hit on the body
down the track and launches it over deep midwicket, not from the middle of the bat but enough on it to clear the fielder there easily
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but straight towards point
down the track but Umer shortens his length, punched towards cover
short of length outside off, goes and punches it towards sweeper cover for a couple
length on the stumps, goes back and works it towards mid-on
length outside off, stays in the crease and swipes it towards deep-backward square leg
length outside off, swats it between deep midwicket and long-on for four
fuller outside off, Salt steers it up and over backward point for four more
length outside off, tucks it towards midwicket, scampers back for the second. It could have been close but the bowler fails to collect the ball and breaks the stumps with his hands
fuller outside off, steers it straight towards the point fielder this time
short of length outside off, skips down and pulls it towards midwicket, Salt calls for two again but Asif Ali says no this time
in the blockhole, jams his bat at it to dig it out towards long-on
length around off, and Asif Ali has smashed it way over the deep midwicket boundary, pulled with disdain
fuller outside off, almost in the blockhole, Asif Ali fails to get bat on it
a high full toss outside off, called a no-ball, but Asif Ali has cut it over point for another six
a low full toss outside off, and that has been crunched through covers, the sweeper had no chance at all. And that's fifty as well for Asif Ali
short of length outside off, waits at the book foot but ends up steering it straight towards point
fuller outside off, looks to smash it on the leg side, loses his shape and ends up dragging it towards midwicket
a slower short ball, angling across the batsman who was looking to pull initially but bails out in the end
length around off, smashed towards wide long-on for four
floated around off and that has been lofted over long-on for a six. For a moment the fielder at long-on thought he had a chance but it just sailed over him
and again, another cutter, fuller around off and this time Asif Ali goes over the bowler's head, clears the sightscreen
fuller on the stumps, lofts it towards long-on for one
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards midwicket for one
length on the stumps, works it towards deep midwicket
and he strikes straightaway. Slower length ball, angling away, Asif Ali looks to go aerial but ends up skying it towards mid-off where Imad takes a good tumbling catch moving to his right
fuller outside off, hits it towards extra cover where Imad has a shy at the bowler's end, misses and concedes a an overthrow
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover, they charging back for the second, could be risky but the throw is not strong enough
length around off, looks to dab it towards third man but ends up hitting it on to his leg, looks to sneak in a single but Amir charges towards the ball and looks to kick it on to the stumps, misses
slower offcutter but wide of the batsman, the umpire stretches his arms
fuller around off, steers towards point, the fielder charges in but fails to collect the ball, the batsmen complete the second

length around middle and leg, Shadab misses the swipe and gets struck on the pad. A big appeal for lbw but given not out. Kings have reviewed it. Replays show there was no bat involved. The ball pitched around leg, the impact was in line as well but it was just missing the off stump
fuller around off, works it towards long-on and Shadab is coming back for the second, makes it safely in the end
fuller outside off, Salt has sliced it over the point fielder for four, 150 comes up with that four
fuller outside off, Salt goes aerial once again, this time over extra cover but ends up hitting it right down the throat of deep extra cover. Yamin completes a straightforward catch there

length ball on the stumps, drops it at his feet and sets off, Shinwari sprints in his followthrough, picks up the ball and underarms it to hit direct, acrobatic stuff but replays confirm Faheem was home
fuller on the stumps and flicked away towards deep midwicket for four
fuller around off, pushes it towards cover-point and sets off for a quick single
short of length outside off, punches it towards point but the fielder is quick to the ball
fuller but down the leg side, needs to be bowled again
length ball on the stumps, punched towards mid-on for one
length ball on the stumps, defended towards the bowler
a bouncer this time, goes for the pull, gets a top-edge towards fine leg. Wait, that has been given as a leg-bye, yes, it hit the batsman right on the helmet
length ball around off, pushed back towards the bowler
length on the stumps, looks to pull but gets an inside edge on to the body, sneaks in a single as the ball falls at his feet
flatter outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but Shinwari makes a tumbling stop at short third man to keep it to one
and that's game over! Fuller on the stumps but Shadab manages to get under it and smashes it over long-on to seal the game
